participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Easy-going and friendly, enjoys discussing hobbies and interests.
participant_1.background: I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house. My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet. I like the movie Godfather. My favorite band is VV Nation. I always wear something purple.

participant_2.name: Jamie Rivers
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, passionate about storytelling and personal growth.
participant_2.background: I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories. My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning. I collect memories of my best friend from out of town. I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family. My parents are my heroes.

content.text: Hey what's up?
Not much, just working on my latest story.
Cool, what kind of stories do you write?
Mostly fantasy, but I also write some sci-fi.
Nice! I love sci-fi.
Oh yeah? What's your favorite sci-fi movie?
I'm not sure if I could pick just one, but I really like the original Star Wars trilogy.
Ah, a classic. I love those movies too.
What are you working on right now?
I'm working on a story about a group of people who are trying to escape a dystopian future.
That sounds really cool!
Thanks! I'm hoping to finish it soon.
I'm sure you will. You're a great writer.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to read, write, and play video games.
Same here! I love to read and play video games.
What are some of your favorite video games?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorites are probably the Zelda games and the Final Fantasy games.
I love Zelda games too!
Nice! They're so good.
Yeah, I'm really excited for the new one coming out this year.
Me too! It looks amazing.
I'm glad we're both fans of Zelda.
Me too! It's one of my favorite series.
It's definitely one of my favorites too.
